name: Plateau
description: A high, flat plateau provides excellent visibility and natural defenses, making it ideal for settlements or military camps. However, access is limited, and the exposed position makes it vulnerable to aerial attacks or harsh weather.
atmosphere: Wind sweeps across flat expanse with constant grass whisper. Sky feels closer. Panoramic views create top-of-world feeling. Every sound carries clearly. Crisp, thin air scented of highland grasses and distant storms.
